segments.text: Hi . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m looking for a job . Are you hiring ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we are . What position are you looking for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . The application for this position has closed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any other positions available ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have only one position open .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Gas Meter Reader . This is a wonderful job for the right person , regular hours , no night shifts , no supervisor behind you , and good pay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I apply for it right now ?
segments.speaker: S2
